title: When i clicked on the lol icon to get into the game, nothing happens. NEED HELP
body: I have re installed it twice. The problem was that when I clicked on the icon to launch the game so I can play, it only showed the league icon for about a second and then disappear. After waiting for a long time nothing appears. How do I fix this problem, cause I really want to play.

replies.body:
Hey Terrence,

Have you checked out the [Wrenchman's Toolbox](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/peVhMJAo-the-wrenchmens-toolbox-common-solutions-to-your-problems-technical-issues) yet? It's got a lot of helpful fixes that can help resolve this launching problem. Otherwise, a few players have been reporting that Avast Antivirus may be blocking League from launching. Are you currently running Avast?
